text: And the cook took up the thigh, and that which was upon it, and set it before Saul. And <FI>Samuel<Fi> said, Behold, that which hath been reserved! set it before thee and eat; because unto the appointed time hath it been kept for thee, for I said, I have invited the people. So Saul did eat with Samuel that day.
name: I Samuel 9:24
